t: Pure Blue H2O Stage 3 Membrane Replacement Filter
s: The Stage 3 filter in our Pure Blue h2o reverse osmosis system was approx. 2 1/2 years old. This was the original Stage 3 filter that came with our system new. This filter is supposed to last 2-5 years. It's our understanding actual lifespan is dependent on ph level and water quality.
